Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Taweret; suspension ring at the back.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.39
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
